features.name: Payment System
features.description: Integrated payment system using PayPal and Portone for subscriptions and content purchases.
requirements: Support Portone for domestic Korean users
Update user subscription status in database after successful payment

features.name: Video Content Management
features.description: Video upload, processing, and delivery system integrated with Vimeo.
requirements: Upload raw videos to Supabase storage
Process videos using backend FFmpeg service (cutting and joining)
Upload processed videos to Vimeo and update DB with Vimeo ID
Restrict video access based on user subscription/purchase status

features.name: Creator Dashboard
features.description: Tools for creators to manage content and view earnings.
requirements: View revenue according to predefined share ratios (e.g., 8:2)
